code: import{getAuthUserData}from"./authReducer";const SET_INITIALIZED="SET_INITIALIZED";let initialState={initialized:false};const appReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_INITIALIZED:return{...state,initialized:true};default:return state;}};export const initializedSuccess=()=>({type:SET_INITIALIZED});export const initializeApp=()=>dispatch=>{let promise=dispatch(getAuthUserData());Promise.all([promise]).then(()=>{dispatch(initializedSuccess());});};export default appReducer;
